template.name: interface
template.content:
<#import "interface.ftl" as if/> package ${interface.packageName}; import java.util.*;
<#if imports?? && (imports?size>0)> <#list imports as imp> import ${imp} </#list> </#if>
<@if.itm interface=interface;c> <#if c??> <@if.itm interface=c></@if.itm> </#if> </@if.itm>
